For this last session before the summer we will have a quick look at using Shiny to create interactive data visualisations. Come and make your come to life!
 
**Preparation:**  If you would like to prepare something in advance, have a look at https://shiny.posit.co/r/getstarted/shiny-basics/lesson1/index.html. 
As always, you are more than welcome to come listen and learn without any preparation. 
 
**When:** Monday July 1st, 09:45 \
**Where:** online via **[Zoom](https://slu-se.zoom.us/j/69486568642)** (Password: 410 410)

The material will be available on [Github](https://github.com/SLUBioinformaticsInfrastructure/Three_Bees_Workshop_Series) after the session.
